Ron,
I have a feeling this gentlemans name came up a couple of months ago. Is he a translator trying to sell a sword for a few hundred dollars to fund a trip to spain or the like? If so I have received unsolicited mail from him and its a scam. Please be very careful.

Ron Hartmann <swords@...> wrote:
Hi all - 

Anybody familiar with an Ebay seller from Poland, a Mr. Nowak? Pawvel T. Nowak? Just curious. So much "checking" these days, I can't recall if he has been mentioned or not. Thanks.

One other question...is Toren Smith on any of these discussion groups? Name sounds familiar but...

Privately is fine: swords@... 

Ron
STL
